div.a:
Aviston Elementary School
2018 National Blue Ribbon School Profile

div.h3: Illinois Gov. J.B. Pritzker announced on Friday, April 17 that schools will be closed for in-person learning for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
div.p: Remote Learning began March 31 and will continue through the end of the school year. – view our remote learning plan here.
